Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
04.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
19.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
03.01.2010 Gb SCR15210 Added the button User directories
09.09.2009 SH SCR14885 Added GNRD_DELETEFILESAFTERDAYS
18.08.2009 AS SCR#14821 consolidated mgtools functions to mging.dll
27.10.2008 SH SR14060 Added UFB563.PI.USERID = blank
29.12.2007 GB SCR13220 "Task Entry" Disabled button OK in Query mode and
if nothing is changed on screen
24.10.2007 GB SCR13010 added history handling
13.05.2003 RR -> SCR3203 Implementation of shortcut handling
19.02.2003 RR Add task to change the description in database
25.07.2002 SH Beautifyed the program according to changes from 26.06.2002 and
- make the button "Check Net" only visible for development right
26-JUN-2002 AS, added button which opens task CheckNetAccess.
Here it is possible to map a network share to a local device and check
for sufficient permissions on GNRD entry.
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
Looking for: description in the language of the current user
Looking for: description in the system language
Looking for: any translations (box on the button)
C: Create /new button
Q: Query button
M: Modify button
D: Delete button
A: Check Network Access button
T: Translation
U: User directories
Create mode
Query, Modify,Translation, User directories
Check for duplicate directory type
IF user_language <> sys_language AND 'Create mode' THEN WARNING
"Please write the description in the systemlanguage (%1)"
(where %1 is the code of the system language)

ExpSyntax.val: InStr ({1,2},'M')>0 AND {1,4}<>'Q' AND (VarMod ('{0,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,5}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,6}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,7}'VAR))

Text.val: Check for errors
No errors
Data has changed ... ask for confirmation
Data has not changed ... just exit

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{5,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,5}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,6}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,7}'VAR)

Text.val: -- Update Description
